Question: At her presidential campaign event on September 19, 2007, Hillary Rodham Clinton also referred to Cheney as this person.
Hints: A grotesque of this person looms over the east face of the Washington National Cathedral's northwest tower.
Premiere magazine also ranked this person on their list of The 100 Greatest Movie Characters of All Time.
Onboard his Star Destroyer, this person telepathically tells Luke that it is his destiny to join the dark side.
